name: Italian-Inspired California Plum Flatbread
author: Anonymous
summary: Peppery arugula, red onion, basil, and ripe California plums create an exciting balance of flavors in this bright summer salad served on top of a warm and cheesy whole wheat flatbread.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided
2 fruit (2-1/8" dia)s fresh California plums, pitted and very thinly sliced
1 pinch Freshly ground pepper and sea salt to taste
directions: Divide dough into 3 pieces; roll each into a very flat oval on a lightly floured board (about 7x11-inches)
Place dough on baking sheets and brush with 1 tablespoon oil
(May be prepared ahead to this point
) Just before serving, top each flat bread with 2/3 cup cheese
Bake at 425 degrees F for 5 minutes
To prepare plum salad, toss remaining oil with remaining ingredients
Place equal amounts on each warm cheese flat bread and cut into 3-inch slices to serve
